name: Starting points: simple and effective tweaks to drive down energy use in existing buildings
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session looks at the "low-hanging fruit" in terms of energy saving measures. This includes both a drive for efficient fabric and an approach which avoids the need for employing overly complex services.

presentations.name: Overview
presentations.speakers: Ant Wilson, Director, Sustainability, Building Engineering, AECOM

presentations.name: Case study: turning ambition into real results in the DECC building
presentations.speakers: Jennifer Rigby, Chief Information Officer, Department of Energy and Climate Change (DECC)

presentations.name: Using energy management systems to improve energy efficiency
presentations.speakers: Dr Andy Lewry, Principal Consultant, BRE
